Philadelphia.Three Logan Square: Three Logan Square, formerly the Bell Atlantic Tower, is a 55-story high-rise office building located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Standing 739 ft (225 m) tall to its structural top, the building encloses 1,300,000 square feet (120,000 m2) of office space. The building, designed by the Philadelphia-based architecture firm Kling Lindquist, was completed in 1991.
